attributes.action: Give former sub-postmaster Alan Bates an OBE.
attributes.additional_details: Although it is not common practice, the Parliament should nominate Mr Alan Bates for an OBE in recognition of his justice and community work addressing the wronging and miscarriages of justice suffered by postmasters due to the actions of the former Post Office leadership and the UK Government.
attributes.background: Give former sub-postmaster Alan Bates an OBE in recognition of his work to bring justice for sub-post managers wronged by the Post Office.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
